Title: ROSEN, GLOBAL INVESTOR COUNSEL, Encourages Newmont Corporation Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action - NEM
Summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM) is facing a securities class action lawsuit due to allegedly providing misleading statements about its ability to increase gold production and lower costs during the class period from February 22, 2024 to October 23, 2024. Investors who purchased Newmont securities during this period may be eligible for compensation.
